briefTitle: Understanding Value in Metastatic Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Understanding Out-of-pocket Expenses and Patient Time Spent on Healthcare in Metastatic Breast Cancer Patients (Understanding Value in Metastatic Breast Cancer)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* All female MBC patients 18 years of age and older who have received treatment within the past two years at UAB

Exclusion Criteria:

* Non-English speakers, patients residing in nursing homes or receiving hospice care
